data.message:
im just curious. 
Why i need a different app to chat with my friends when i could do it from facebook app?? and dont say that is faster because it was ok before. 
Why do i see posts in my iphone from yesterday and later and not only the soonest posts?? 
Why i can go from facebook app to the messenger app but i cant do the opposite?? 
i dont want to be rude but, guys, if you want us to move just say it.. :/ I like facebook and enjoy it very much but.....

replies.message: i forgot to mention that the videos are starting without me asking for it. people now uploading any video they want during the day. other people and specially kids are watching people killing, animals on fire etc.. do you thing for all these??? or you just making changes just like that??
